name: Climb The Tower (Trialblazer)
description:
This game is for the Nokia3310 game jam this game is about going to the top of the tower
CONTROLS:
Left arrow: move left
Right arrow: move right
Up arrow: jump
DISCLAIMERS:
this game was made for the Nokia3310 game jam and will not be receiving updates.
when you die you must start the game over from the beginning
when you download the game you have to click on index.html for the game to run
